content: Investments Asked by AnonymousAsked on 05 Mar 2019DBS planning to reduce reliance on Singapore consumers, by expanding into India. Thoughts?1 answerAnswerBump0

Gabriel Tham, Kenichi Tag Team Member at Tag TeamLevel 8. WizardAnswered on 06 Mar 2019Singapore's population is so small, plus birth rates are declining. This means there is limited growth here. India's population is huge. Just capturing a small % of that will eclipse the number of Singapore accounts they have.With the growth of India, their spending power will also increase.0 comments0
